PRE_GAME_GRID_PLACEHOLDER: Configure game settings and press 'Start Game'.
CONTROLS_THREAT_TOOLTIP_ACTIVE: Threat Overlay: Active. Click to deactivate.
CONTROLS_THREAT_TOOLTIP_INACTIVE: Threat Overlay: Inactive. Click to activate.
CONTROLS_OBSERVER_COUNT_TOOLTIP_ACTIVE: Observer Count Overlay: Active. Click to deactivate.
CONTROLS_OBSERVER_COUNT_TOOLTIP_INACTIVE: Observer Count Overlay: Inactive. Click to activate.
ARMAMENT_PANEL_NO_ARMAMENTS: No armaments installed. Collect Data Chips for Drone Upgrades.
ARMAMENT_TOOLTIP_NOT_ENOUGH_ENERGY_INITI: Not enough initial energy. Requires: {cost}, Current: {currentEnergy}.
ARMAMENT_BOOSTER_MAX_USES_REACHED_TOOLTI: Max uses ({usesPerTurn}) for this turn reached.
ARMAMENT_CRASH_BOMB_OVERHEATED_TOOLTIP: Crash Bomb system overheated. Current Heat: {currentHeat}/{maxHeat}. Cools {coolingRatePerTurn} per turn. Cooldown in {turnsToCooldown} turns. Energy regen & armaments disabled.
ARMAMENT_TOOLTIP_OVERHEATED: System Overheated. This armament cannot be used.
ARMAMENT_DETAIL_PLACEHOLDER: Select an armament to see details.
ARMAMENT_ACTION_PROMPT_INSTANT: Click on the map to activate.
ARMAMENT_ACTION_PROMPT_PLACEMENT: Select a target hex to place.
MESSAGE_SYSTEM_ONLINE_ACTIVATED: System online. Drone activated. Objective: Survive and collect data.
MESSAGE_DRONE_ONLINE_ACQUISITION: Drone online. Primary objective: Data acquisition. (Endless Mode)
MESSAGE_CRITICAL_ERROR_CENTER_HEX: Critical Error: Center hex (0,0) not found during initialization.
MESSAGE_CRITICAL_ERROR_STAGE_NOT_FOUND: Critical Error: Stage ID '{stageId}' not found.
MESSAGE_CRITICAL_ERROR_INVALID_GAME_STAR: Critical Error: Invalid game start parameters.
MESSAGE_SYSTEM_INTEGRITY_IMPROVED: Drone systems updated! Drone Level reached {playerLevel}. Upgrade Point +1
MESSAGE_SYSTEM_ENHANCEMENT_OPENED_DEBUG: DEBUG: Drone Upgrade interface opened (All Options).
MESSAGE_UPGRADE_ATTEMPT_FAILED_NO_OPTION: Error: No upgrade modules currently available.
MESSAGE_CANNOT_ACCESS_UPGRADES_NOW: Cannot access drone upgrades at this time.
MESSAGE_MANEUVER_IMPOSSIBLE_NON_ADJACENT: Maneuver impossible: Target hex is not adjacent.
MESSAGE_CANNOT_ACTIVATE_ARMAMENT_NOW: Cannot activate armaments at this time.
MESSAGE_NOT_ENOUGH_ENERGY_FOR_ARMAMENT: Not enough energy for {armamentName}. Requires: {cost}, Current: {currentEnergy}.
MESSAGE_BOOSTER_MAX_USES_REACHED: Booster has reached max uses ({usesPerTurn}) for this turn.
MESSAGE_STEALTH_ENGAGED_SUCCESS: {armamentTitle} engaged! Stealth active for {duration} turns. Energy: -{cost}
MESSAGE_CANNOT_DEPLOY_MORE_TRAPS: Cannot deploy more EMP Traps. Maximum capacity reached.
MESSAGE_CANNOT_DEPLOY_MORE_BARRICADES: Cannot deploy more Barricades. Maximum capacity reached.
MESSAGE_CANNOT_DEPLOY_MORE_CHARGE_FIELDS: Cannot deploy more Charge Fields. Maximum deployed.
MESSAGE_CANNOT_DEPLOY_MORE_COLLECTOR_DRO: Cannot deploy more Collector Drones. Maximum deployed.
MESSAGE_TRAP_INITIATING: Initiating EMP Trap deployment. Select an adjacent empty hex. Energy cost: -{cost}
MESSAGE_BARRICADE_INITIATING: Initiating Barricade deployment. Select an adjacent empty hex. Energy cost: -{cost}
MESSAGE_CHARGE_FIELD_INITIATING: Initiating Charge Field deployment. Select an adjacent empty hex. Energy cost: -{cost}
MESSAGE_COLLECTOR_DRONE_INITIATING: Initiating Collector Drone deployment. Select an adjacent empty hex. Energy cost: -{cost}
MESSAGE_CANNOT_DEPLOY_TRAP_HERE: Cannot deploy EMP Trap there. Select an empty adjacent hex.
MESSAGE_CANNOT_DEPLOY_BARRICADE_HERE: Cannot deploy Barricade there. Select an empty adjacent hex.
MESSAGE_CANNOT_DEPLOY_CHARGE_FIELD_HERE: Cannot deploy Charge Field there. Select an empty adjacent hex.
MESSAGE_CANNOT_DEPLOY_COLLECTOR_DRONE_HE: Cannot deploy Collector Drone there. Select an empty adjacent hex.
MESSAGE_CRITICAL_ERROR_DRONE_OFFLINE: Critical Error: Drone offline. Cannot process hostile units.
MESSAGE_HOSTILE_STUNNED: Hostile unit at ({q}, {r}) stunned by EMP for {turns} turns.
MESSAGE_DRONE_CRITICALLY_DAMAGED: Drone critically damaged by hostile unit at ({q}, {r}). Systems failing... Game Over.
MESSAGE_DRONE_CRITICALLY_DAMAGED_NO_COOR: Drone critically damaged. Systems failing... Game Over.
MESSAGE_HOSTILE_HIT_EMP_TRAP: Hostile unit at ({q}, {r}) hit EMP Trap! Stunned for {stunDuration} turns.
MESSAGE_HOSTILE_FAILS_TO_DETECT_STEALTHE: Hostile unit ({q},{r}) failed to detect stealthed drone.
MESSAGE_HOSTILE_PATH_BLOCKED: Hostile unit Lv.{level} at ({q},{r}) path blocked by another unit.
MESSAGE_HOSTILE_PATH_BLOCKED_BY_BARRICAD: Hostile unit Lv.{level} at ({q},{r}) path blocked by Barricade.
MESSAGE_HOSTILE_PATH_BLOCKED_BY_COLLECTO: Hostile unit Lv.{level} at ({q},{r}) path blocked by Collector Drone.
MESSAGE_BARRICADE_DESTROYED_BY_PLAYER: Barricade at ({q},{r}) destroyed by player movement.
MESSAGE_PLAYER_SWAPPED_WITH_COLLECTOR_DR: Swapped positions with Collector Drone {droneId} at ({q},{r}).
MESSAGE_ITEM_DETECTED_ON_MAP: Sensor ping: New {itemName} detected on map.
MESSAGE_WAVE_INCOMING_WARNING: Warning! Enemy wave incoming. Predicted spawn locations: {locations}
MESSAGE_ESCAPE_PORTAL_SPAWNED: Escape Portal active at ({q},{r})! Reach it to complete the stage.
MESSAGE_ESCAPE_PORTAL_SPAWN_FAILED: Error: Could not find a safe spawn location for the Escape Portal.
MESSAGE_AUTO_MOVE_NO_SAFE_HEXES: Auto-Move: No safe hexes available. Stopping.
MESSAGE_ENEMY_PUSHED_AND_STUNNED_BY_SHOC: Enemy unit at ({q},{r}) pushed by Shockwave and stunned for {stunDuration} turns.
MESSAGE_ENEMY_NOT_PUSHED_BY_SHOCKWAVE_OB: Enemy unit at ({q},{r}) was not pushed by Shockwave due to obstruction.
MESSAGE_ENEMY_STUNNED_BY_SHOCKWAVE_NO_PU: Enemy unit at ({q},{r}) stunned by Shockwave for {stunDuration} turns (no push).
MESSAGE_JAMMER_GLOBAL_ACTIVATED: {armamentTitle} activated! Reducing sight range of all enemies by {reduction} for {duration} turns. Energy: -{cost}
MESSAGE_ENEMY_SIGHT_REDUCED_BY_JAMMER: Enemy unit at ({q},{r}) sight range reduced by {reduction} for {duration} turns.
MESSAGE_JAMMER_EFFECT_WORE_OFF_ENEMY: Jammer effect wore off for enemy unit at ({q},{r}).
MESSAGE_JAMMER_GLOBAL_EFFECT_WORE_OFF: Global Jammer field effect wore off.
MESSAGE_CRASH_BOMB_ACTIVATED: {armamentTitle} activated! All entities (enemies, items, placed units) cleared. Cost: {initialCost} + all remaining energy. System heat set to {maxHeat}. Cools {coolingRatePerTurn} per turn.
MESSAGE_OVERHEAT_WORE_OFF: System overheat resolved. Energy regeneration restored.
MESSAGE_MAX_ARMAMENTS_REACHED: Maximum number of armaments ({maxCount}) installed. Cannot install new armament.
DEBUG_MESSAGE_REWIND_SUCCESSFUL: DEBUG: Rewound to start of turn {turn}.
AI_MODE_NO_MOVES_STOPPING: AI Mode: No valid moves. Stopping.
AI_MODE_NO_BEST_MOVE_STOPPING: AI Mode: Cannot find best move. Stopping.
AI_MODE_ALL_MOVES_GAME_OVER_STOPPING: AI Mode: All moves lead to game over. Stopping.
AI_MODE_NO_UPGRADE_CHOSEN: AI Mode: Could not choose an upgrade. Stopping.
AI_MODE_MCTS_NO_VALID_ACTION_STOPPING: MCTS AI: Could not determine a valid action. Stopping.
AI_MODE_MCTS_ALL_ACTIONS_LEAD_TO_GAME_OV: MCTS AI: All actions lead to game over. Stopping.
AI_MODE_MCTS_TIMEOUT_STOPPING: MCTS AI: Simulation timed out. Stopping.
AI_MODE_MCTS_ERROR_STOPPING: MCTS AI: Error during simulation. Stopping.
ARMAMENT_BOOSTER_DESC: Grants +{actionsGranted} action(s). Max {usesPerTurn} uses/turn. Cost: {cost} Energy.
ARMAMENT_STEALTH_DESC: Evade enemy detection with {avoidanceChance}% chance for {duration} turns. Cost: {cost} Energy.
ARMAMENT_TRAP_DESC: Deploy an EMP trap. Stuns enemies for {stunDuration} turns. Max {maxCharges} deployed. Cost: {cost} Energy.
ARMAMENT_BARRICADE_DESC: Deploy a barricade. Lasts {duration} turns. Max {maxCharges} deployed. Cost: {cost} Energy.
ARMAMENT_SHOCKWAVE_DESC: Push all adjacent enemies {pushDistance} hex(es). Pushed enemies are stunned for {stunDuration} turns. Cost: {cost} Energy.
ARMAMENT_JAMMER_GLOBAL_DESC: Deploy a field reducing all enemies' sight range by {reduction} for {duration} turns. Cost: {cost} Energy.
ARMAMENT_CHARGE_FIELD_DESC: Deploy a field (radius {radius} hexes). Recover +{recovery} energy/turn if inside. Lasts {duration} turns. Max {maxPlaced} deployed. Cost: {cost} Energy.
ARMAMENT_COLLECTOR_DRONE_DESC: Deploy a drone. Search radius {searchRadius} hexes. Lifespan {lifespan} turns. Max {maxPlaced} deployed. Cost: {cost} Energy.
ARMAMENT_CRASH_BOMB_DESC: WARNING: Clears all entities. Cost: {initialCost} + All Remaining Energy. Sets system heat to {maxHeat}. Cools {coolingRatePerTurn} per turn.
UPGRADE_ARMAMENT_TRAP_EFFECT_DESC: Stun Duration: {currentStunDuration}t -> {newStunDuration}t. Max Deployed: {currentMaxCharges} -> {newMaxCharges}. Cost: {currentCost} -> {newCost} Energy.
UPGRADE_ARMAMENT_JAMMER_GLOBAL_EFFECT_DE: Sight Reduction: {currentReduction} -> {newReduction}. Field Duration: {currentDuration}t -> {newDuration}t. Cost: {currentCost} -> {newCost} Energy.
UPGRADE_ARMAMENT_CHARGE_FIELD_EFFECT_DES: Radius: {currentRadius} -> {newRadius}. Recovery: +{currentRecovery} -> +{newRecovery}. Duration: {currentDuration}t -> {newDuration}t. Max Deployed: {currentMaxPlaced} -> {newMaxPlaced}. Cost: {currentCost} -> {newCost} Energy.
UPGRADE_ARMAMENT_COLLECTOR_DRONE_EFFECT_: Search Radius: {currentSearchRadius} -> {newSearchRadius}. Lifespan: {currentLifespan}t -> {newLifespan}t. Max Deployed: {currentMaxPlaced} -> {newMaxPlaced}. Cost: {currentCost} -> {newCost} Energy.
UPGRADE_ARMAMENT_CRASH_BOMB_EFFECT_DESC: Initial Cost: {currentInitialCost} -> {newInitialCost} Energy. Max Heat: {maxHeat} (fixed). Cooling/Turn: {currentCoolingRatePerTurn} -> {newCoolingRatePerTurn}.
UPGRADE_ENERGY_RECOVERY1_DESC: Increase energy recovery per turn by {value}. (Current: {currentRecovery} -> New: {newRecovery})
STAGE_DESC_STAGE_1: Basic training simulation. Master controls and survive initial contact.
STAGE_DESC_STAGE_2: Increased hostile activity detected in Gamma Sector. Proceed with caution.
STAGE_DESC_STAGE_3: Navigate a dense urban environment teeming with hostiles. Tactical positioning is key.
STAGE_DESC_STAGE_4: Infiltrate a heavily fortified enemy stronghold. Expect heavy resistance.
